MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY7 and KY15 postcode areas of Cupar and Glenrothes. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.09pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area, repairs are taking longer than expected due to on site difficulties. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:00pm on Wednesday, 13 January 2021
